item.name: Remap Caps Lock to Hyper
item.appendix: OS X doesn't have a Hyper. This maps CapsLock hold to Control+Shift+Option+Command, CapsLock only to Escape.
item.autogen: --KeyOverlaidModifier-- KeyCode::F19, KeyCode::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::ESCAPE
